recipesJson.name: Hot Tomales
recipesJson.author: Muscles
recipesJson.description: I made this recipe to mimic Big Red Gum but it turned out just like Hot Tomales - FTW! TPA Cinnamon Red Hot can be increased or decreased to suit. For me,  at 8% it is pretty hot and just the way I like it. INW Cactus provides the nice wet mouth feel that you would expect when chewing on the real thing.
